name: Dimwarper
description:
Climb towers with platforms, enemies and traps present in two different dimensions, between which You swap with one press of a button. Complete journey including eight different levels with increasing level of difficulty or jump into the Endless Tower mode and try scoring the highest possible score. Whatever you choose we hope You have fun!



With each tower, You will face a new type of danger:

- Smaller platforms
- Moving platforms
- Fireballs
- Ice lasers
- Fire and ice monsters
- Changing speed of the game
